text: Six Cylinder Love is a 1931 American comedy movie directed by Thornton Freeland and is the second version of the 1921 play of the same name. It stars Spencer Tracy, Edward Everett Horton, Sidney Fox, Una Merkel, Bert Roach, El Brendel and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1931 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Thornton Freeland
title: Six Cylinder Love
